trans-unit.source: Associates a security action with a custom security attribute.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DBDataPermissionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Data.Common.DBDataPermissionAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the security action values representing an action that can be performed by declarative security.
trans-unit.target: Én av sikkerhet Handlingsverdier som representerer en handling som ikke kan utføres av deklarerende sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a blank password is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et tomt passord er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a blank password is allowed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et tomt passord er tillatt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a permitted connection string.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en gyldig tilkoblingsstreng.

trans-unit.source: Multiple connection strings may be identified.
You may also provide additional connection string restrictions using **KeyRestrictions**.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi ekstra tilkobling streng begrensninger ved å bruke **KeyRestrictions**.

trans-unit.source: Identifies whether the list of connection string parameters identified by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions*> property are the only connection string parameters allowed.
trans-unit.target: Angir om listen over streng tilkoblingsparameterne identifisert av den <xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions*>egenskapen er bare streng tilkoblingsparameterne tillatt.</xref:System.Data.Common.DBDataPermissionAttribute.KeyRestrictions*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets connection string parameters that are allowed or disallowed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilkoblingen strengparametere som er tillatt eller ikke tillatt.

trans-unit.source: One or more connection string parameters that are allowed or disallowed.
trans-unit.target: Én eller flere streng tilkoblingsparameterne som er tillatt eller ikke tillatt.

trans-unit.source: Identifies whether the attribute should serialize the connection string.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer om attributtet skal serialisere tilkoblingsstrengen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute should serialize the connection string; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis attributtet skal serialisere tilkoblingsstrengen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies whether the attribute should serialize the set of key restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer om attributtet skal serialisere settet med key-begrensninger.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the attribute should serialize the set of key restrictions; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis attributtet skal serialisere settet med nøkkelen begrensninger; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
